title: I Have Become The Hero’s Rival - Novel Updates
genre: Adventure   Comedy   Drama   Fantasy   Romance   Shoujo
tags: Adapted to Manhwa   Aristocracy   Arrogant Characters   Calm Protagonist   Caring Protagonist   Cute Protagonist   Demons   Determined Protagonist   Doting Love Interests   European Ambience   Familial Love   Female Protagonist   Friendship   Glasses-wearing Love Interests   Handsome Male Lead   Heroes   Kind Love Interests   Knights   Lazy Protagonist   Love Rivals   Love Triangles   Magic   Male Yandere   Mob Protagonist   Nobles   Obsessive Love   Older Love Interests   Poor Protagonist   Possessive Characters   Priests   Royalty   Schemes And Conspiracies   Sharing A Body   Slow Romance   Spirit Users   Time Skip   Tomboyish Female Lead   Tragic Past   Transmigration   Unconditional Love   Wizards
author: 설이수
description:
“I’m gonna live with Irene for the rest of my life.”

“….. What?”

“I said, I won’t get married and I’ll spend the rest of my life with Irene!”

I wish I heard it wrong. Regrettably, I couldn’t stop Claudia.

“As long as I have Irene, I don’t need anything else.”

The three men looked at each other, then glared at me with angry eyes.

The insane obsession of The Crown Prince’s possessiveness, the smiling Duke yet something malice hid underneath him, and the cold eyes of The Knight that sent chill to my bones. It’s as if they regarded me as their rival.

“Shit. What kind of situation is this?”>
